title: Dayz full game(steam and nonsteam version + Lan + Multiplayer)
description:
Dayz full game(steam and nonsteam version + Lan + Multiplayer)

Original dayz mod by Dean hall - Dayz mod version 1.7.1.5

This version was moded by ssddayz - Nothing has been changed though.
The game is on it's original shape. It has it's own private hive with saves.

Instructions - Steam version.
1.Download the game.
2.Extract the dayz1715 folder to Desktop
3.Run server.bat, then run dayz_game.bat to join your server.

Instructions - Non- Steam version.
Please follow these steps if you dont have steam installed.

1.Download the game.
2.Extract the dayz1715 folder to Desktop
3.Install Directx
4.Install dayz key(right click ArmA 2 OA - Bad CD Key.reg and change the pc username only. 
Just edit my pc username(lol) to yours).
5.After that, Run server.bat then run dayz_game.bat to join your server
